snippet: German-Jewish writer Stefanie Zweig, best known for her autobiographical novel "Nowhere in Africa" has died. She was 81....

headline.print_headline: German-Jewish Writer Stefanie Zweig Dies at 81
headline.main: German-Jewish Writer Stefanie Zweig Dies at 81

lead_paragraph: German-Jewish writer Stefanie Zweig, best known for her autobiographical novel "Nowhere in Africa" has died. She was 81.
